product_name: Skin Cafe End of Dull Hair Banana Shampoo with Egg Protein – 250ml
product_description: Skin Cafe Banana Shampoo harnesses the power of vitamin-enriched banana and nutrient-rich egg protein to leave hair nourished from root to tip and strengthen the hair stands, as well as diminish hair fall, leaving your hair healthy and soft. MADE IN BANGLADESH

product_name: Skin Cafe Silky Tresses Moisturizing Conditioner – 120ml
product_description: Developed with the nutrients of Argan Oil, Flower Oil, and Biotin, this conditioner moisturizes and adds sheen to the hair. The blend of these ingredients helps restore shine to hair and reduces dryness, making them less frizzy. The several vitamins and minerals present in these ingredients nourish the hair, leaving them healthy and silky.

product_name: Skin Cafe Sunscreen SPF 50 PA+++ Lightweight & Non-Greasy – 60gm
product_description: Sun tan is a regular skin problem for both men and women. Tanning is the process of increased melanin production caused by exposure to sunlight. To beat this, we have come up with our new Skin Cafe Sunscreen SPF 50 PA+++. SPF 50 blocks 98% of the ultraviolet rays. It acts powerfully on your skin to keep it safe from the harmfulness of sun. This lightweight sunscreen is non-comedogenic and gives you a matte finish. It has UVB-UVA protection and preventive anti-mark effect.

product_name: Skin Cafe My Therapist Serum – Brightening – 30ml
product_description: This serum reduces freckles and melasma on the skin and helps to make the skin look bright and lively. It is packed with actives like, 5% Niacinamide, 2% Alpha Arbutin, Hyaluronic Acid and Rose Extract. Lightens dark spots and blemishes. Reduces the appearance of melasma and age spots. Evens out and brightens skin tone. Dermatologically Tested

product_name: Skin Cafe Pure & Natural Aloe Vera gel 98% – 240ml
product_description: Skin Cafe Pure & Natural 98% Aloe Vera Gel- this soothing gel is enriched with 98% natural aloe vera free from paraben, mineral oil and artificial color.

product_name: Skin Cafe Makeup Cleansing Oil Advanced - 120ml
product_description: Skin Cafe Makeup Cleansing Oil Advanced is a gentle yet effective makeup remover that dissolves even waterproof makeup without stripping the skin. Formulated with a blend of natural oils, it cleanses deeply while maintaining skin's natural moisture balance. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

product_name: Skin Cafe End of Hair Fall Biotin Shampoo with Onion Extract - 250ml
product_description: Skin Cafe End of Hair Fall Biotin Shampoo is enriched with onion extract and biotin to strengthen hair follicles and reduce hair fall. The powerful combination of ingredients helps nourish the scalp, promote hair growth, and improve overall hair health. Regular use results in stronger, thicker, and healthier hair.

product_name: Skin Cafe Micellar Water - 120ml
product_description: Skin Cafe Micellar Water is a gentle, no-rinse cleansing solution that effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities from the skin. Formulated with micelles that act like magnets to lift away dirt and oil, it cleanses without disrupting the skin's natural balance. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

product_name: Skin Cafe Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face Wash with Seaweed Extract - 140ml
product_description: Skin Cafe Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Face Wash is formulated with seaweed extract and hyaluronic acid to cleanse and hydrate the skin simultaneously. This gentle face wash removes dirt, oil, and impurities while maintaining the skin's natural moisture barrier. The seaweed extract provides essential nutrients, leaving skin clean, soft, and refreshed.

product_name: Skin Cafe 100% Natural Essential Oil - Tea Tree - 10ml
product_description: Skin Cafe 100% Natural Tea Tree Essential Oil is known for its powerful antiseptic, antifungal, and antibacterial properties. This pure essential oil helps treat acne, reduce inflammation, and soothe skin irritations. It can be used in skincare routines, aromatherapy, or as a natural household cleaner.

product_name: Skin Cafe Avocado Oil (Cold Pressed) – 120ml
product_description: Skin Cafe 100% Natural Cold Pressed Avocado Oil is a rich source of vitamin A, B, D & E, amino acids, and essential fatty acids. The oil helps nourish skin layers. It has a high moisturizing & emollient power which is good for dry skin. It boosts collagen production & fights against wrinkles & premature skin aging. Vitamin E of this avocado oil stimulates the scalp's blood circulation that facilitates hair growth & fights against dandruff.

product_name: Skin Cafe My Therapist Serum - Pore Perfect - 30ml
product_description: This serum helps reduce the appearance of large pores and controls sebum while hydrating the skin. It is packed with actives like 5% Niacinamide, 0.5% Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, and Green Tea Extract. Green Tea Extract helps regulate the skin's

product_name: Skin Cafe Floral Hydrating Toner – 110ml
product_description: Purify your skin with the soothing and refreshing hydrating toner composed of rose, hibiscus, and tuberose extracts, powered with the versatile niacinamide, to redeem the pH balance and provide hydration to your skin. This Floral Hydrating Toner cleanses makeup residue, tones up the skin, helps minimize pores to make it reinvigorated, healthy-looking, and more beautiful.

product_name: Skin Cafe Soft Lips Lip Balm-Smoothie – 10gm
product_description: Dive into the luxurious world of Soft Lips Smoothie by SKIN CAFE, where your lips find their ultimate sanctuary! Locks 2X moisture with Vitamin E to banish dryness and unveil supple lips, this lip balm whispers promises of velvety softness. Experience the essence of natural beauty with two Irresistible Flavors, one swipe at a time.

product_name: Skin Cafe 100% Natural Essential Oil – Lavender – 10 ml
product_description: Skin Cafe 100% Natural Lavender Essential Oil is a multi-faceted essential oil that is taken out from the flowers of the lavender plant. Lavender essential oil can be used for numerous problems. This essential oil will help to reduce hair loss as well as joint pains. It can lessen the appearance of blemishes and solve eczema problem. Moreover, it will help with stress, anxiety, insomnia and hypertension problem.

product_name: Skin Cafe Coconut Oil – 250ml
product_description: Coconut Oil is known as The master of all saturated oils. Skin Cafe Coconut Oil is an excellent choice for the hair and the skin. This oil moisturizes the hair and scalp, aids in healthy hair growth and also works as a protective barrier that helps trap moisture inside and keep the skin hydrated and soft.

product_name: Skin Cafe Moisture Maven Body Lotion – 350ml
product_description: Indulge your skin with Skin Cafe Moisture Maven body lotion, a perfect blend of shea butter and Vitamin E that swiftly melts into the skin to enhance your natural sheen while making it buttery soft and nourished. Experience the non-irritated and super hydrated perfection in every drop. Your skin deserves the best!

product_name: Skin Cafe Soft Lips Lip Balm-Mojito – 10gm
product_description: Dive into the luxurious world of Soft Lips Mojito by SKIN CAFE, where your lips find their ultimate sanctuary! product_name: Skin Cafe Argan Oil 100% Pure and Natural – 30ml
product_description: Skin Cafe 100% Pure and Natural Argan Oil is a natural oil extracted from the kernels of the argan tree. It is rich in essential nutrients, antioxidants, and anti-inflammatory compounds. This oil helps to hydrate and soften skin, improve skin elasticity, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and protect skin from sun damage. It can also be used to nourish and strengthen hair, reduce frizz, and add shine.

product_name: Skin Cafe Hair Fall Treatment – 100gm
product_description: Skin Cafe Hair Fall Treatment is a powerful formula designed to combat hair loss and promote healthy hair growth. Enriched with natural ingredients like onion extract, fenugreek, and essential oils, this treatment strengthens hair follicles, nourishes the scalp, and reduces breakage. Regular use helps to minimize hair fall and improve overall hair health.
